alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 3:39AM MST until January 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys and Salt Lake Valley. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Briefly heavy snow and strong winds are expected late Tuesday afternoon and early evening as well as late Wednesday afternoon and early evening. Snow squalls will be possible, bringing strong winds and flash freezing conditions. Multiple additional rounds of snow are expected through the weekend.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.

area.areaDesc: Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys
